description: Related to n-th powers of polynomials.
references: N. J. A. Sloane and Simon Plouffe, The Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences, Academic Press, 1995 (includes this sequence).
links: T. Chinburg and M. Henriksen, Sums of k-th powers in the ring of polynomials with integer coefficients, Acta Arithmetica, 29 (1976), 227-250.
author: _N. J. A. Sloane_.
